title: 3 silver/golds looking for 2 more players to join clash team!
body: We aren't really all that serious and are mainly looking to have a good time while having fun! I mainly play top/mid, my friend is jg/mid and we have a support main. We also mainly use discord, so add me there if you're interested at: Jam Jam#2187

replies.body: Yeah me and my friend are a duo bot can play
